content.raw:
I can't get roslaunch to work in the Dockerfile, I think mostly because roscore will only start as the last entry:
CMD roscore

The examples given [here](https://hub.docker.com/_/ros/) show roscore being started when the image is run, then rosrun being used in subsequent runs of the same image.  But seems that approach won't work here, as we need it all to start from the one Dockerfile and run script.
